**Model A**
- **Why did you decide to use Jason Voorhees to get your power back?**: [Audio of the model's response is provided for this round] "Heh heh heh... The little shits on Elm Street forgot all about me. They took away my fear, and a guy like me can't work without it. I was stuck in Hell, getting weaker by the day. But that big lummox, Jason? He was my ticket back. I dressed up as his dear old mommy, gave him a little push, and sent him up to Springwood to do my dirty work. He was just supposed to be the opening act, you know? Get 'em screamin' my name again."
- **Did you ever worry Jason would get in your way?**: "Worry? Ha! About that hockey-puck? Please. He was a tool. A big, dumb, blunt instrument. I figured I'd let him chop up a few of my kids, then I'd step in and take over. I never figured the big lug would get so... territorial. He's got a one-track mind, and it's not a pretty one."
- **How did you feel when Jason started stealing your kills?**: "PISSED! How do you think I felt? Those were MY children! My town! My fear! That stupid mama's boy was stealing my thunder. - **Did you ever worry Jason would get in your way?**: "Worry? Ha! I'm Freddy Krueger. Worry isn't in my vocabulary. I saw him as a means to an end, a pawn. - **How did you feel when Jason started stealing your kills?**: "Infuriated. He was trespassing. He was a janitor, I'm the main event! The souls of the Elm Street kids belong to ME.
